extension.name: markItUp Editor
extension.description: Displays the [markItUp Editor](http://markitup.jaysalvat.com/home/) on any fields that use Markdown or Textile as a Text Formatter.

releases.release: - Initial public release - Update accessors for Symphony 2.2 - Update markitup to 1.1.6 (latest at time of release) - Now applies Markdown/Textile formatters for variants of Markdown/Textile such as Markdown Extra - Only appends assets to the Entry editor instead of all backend pages
